author: oflg
description: TiddlyWiki-based memory programme using advanced FSRS algorithm
name: Tidme Core
title: $:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw
readme:
Installation and usage tutorial is available at [[Tidme Manual|https://oflg.github.io/Tidme/manual/]].

可在 [[墨屉手册|https://oflg.github.io/Tidme/manual/zh-Hans]] 查看安装使用教程。
